list_definition.definition: a written report on a book, play etc giving the writer’s opinion of it
revision; studying or going over one’s notes

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have just enough time for a quick review of my speech
I made a quick review of my notes before the test.

list_definition.definition: to make or have a review of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The book was reviewed in yesterday’s paper
We’ll review the situation at the end of the month.

list_definition.definition: to revise; to go over one’s notes, lessons etc in preparation for an examination

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have to review (my notes) for the test tomorrow.

list_ex_of_english: Truncated literature search strategies may often lead to uncertainty surrounding the conclusions of a review.
This is a straightforward book to review, but a rather more difficult one to recommend to readers.
Most of the research reviewed in the preceding nine categories tends to favor the 2-gen over the 1-gen model.
The second uses qualitative methods to examine themes and issues developed from this literature review.
This review examines the roles of the major fibrinolytic factors involved in clot lysis.
This review of assessment research might be organized around assessment or curriculum themes.
The authors review evidence indicating that dynamic structural interactions between astrocytes and synapses affect hippocampal synaptic physiology, behavior, and disease.
Based on this definition, life review is a particularly structured form of reminiscence.
